columns.description: A unique identifier defining the method of data generator-calculated split cost allocation.
columns.name: AllocatedMethodId

columns.description: A set of properties describing how resources are allocated in data generator-defined split cost allocation.
columns.name: AllocatedMethodDetails

columns.description: The identifier of the object to which cost is allocated in data generator-calculated split cost allocation.
columns.name: AllocatedResourceId

columns.description: The display name of the object to which cost is allocated in data generator-calculated split cost allocation.
columns.name: AllocatedResourceName

columns.description: A set of tags assigned to tag sources that are applicable to *allocated charges* in data generator-calculated split cost allocation.
columns.name: AllocatedTags

columns.description: A host-provider-assigned identifier for a physically separated and isolated area within a Region that provides high availability and fault tolerance.
columns.name: AvailabilityZone

columns.description: A *charge* serving as the basis for invoicing, inclusive of all reduced rates and discounts while excluding the *amortization* of upfront *charges* (one-time or recurring).
columns.name: BilledCost

columns.description: The identifier assigned to a *billing account* by the invoice issuer.
columns.name: BillingAccountId

columns.description: The display name assigned to a *billing account*.
columns.name: BillingAccountName

columns.description: An invoice-issuer-assigned name to identify the type of *billing account*.
columns.name: BillingAccountType

columns.description: Represents the currency that a *charge* was billed in.
columns.name: BillingCurrency

columns.description: The *exclusive end bound* of a *billing period*.
columns.name: BillingPeriodEnd

columns.description: The *inclusive start bound* of a *billing period*.
columns.name: BillingPeriodStart

columns.description: The identifier assigned to a *capacity reservation* by the service provider.
columns.name: CapacityReservationId

columns.description: Indicates whether the *charge* represents either the consumption of a *capacity reservation* or when a *capacity reservation* is unused.
columns.name: CapacityReservationStatus

columns.description: Represents the highest-level classification of a *charge* based on the nature of how it is billed.
columns.name: ChargeCategory

columns.description: Indicates whether the *row* represents a correction to a previously invoiced *billing period*.
columns.name: ChargeClass

columns.description: Self-contained summary of the *charge's* purpose and price.
columns.name: ChargeDescription

columns.description: Indicates how often a *charge* will occur.
columns.name: ChargeFrequency

columns.description: The *exclusive end bound* of a *charge period*.
columns.name: ChargePeriodEnd

columns.description: The *inclusive start bound* of a *charge period*.
columns.name: ChargePeriodStart

columns.description: Indicates whether the *commitment discount* identified in the CommitmentDiscountId column is based on usage quantity or cost (aka "spend").
columns.name: CommitmentDiscountCategory

columns.description: The identifier assigned to a *commitment discount* by the service provider.
columns.name: CommitmentDiscountId

columns.description: The display name assigned to a *commitment discount*.
columns.name: CommitmentDiscountName

columns.description: The amount of a *commitment discount* purchased or accounted for in *commitment discount* related *rows* that is denominated in Commitment Discount Units.
columns.name: CommitmentDiscountQuantity

columns.description: Indicates whether the *charge* corresponds with the consumption of a *commitment discount* or the unused portion of the committed amount.
columns.name: CommitmentDiscountStatus

columns.description: A service-provider-assigned identifier for the type of *commitment discount* applied to the *row*.
columns.name: CommitmentDiscountType

columns.description: The service-provider-specified measurement unit indicating how a service provider measures the Commitment Discount Quantity of a *commitment discount*.
columns.name: CommitmentDiscountUnit

columns.description: The volume of a metered SKU associated with a *resource* or *service* used, based on the Consumed Unit.
columns.name: ConsumedQuantity

columns.description: Service-provider-specified measurement unit indicating how a service provider measures usage of a metered SKU associated with a *resource* or *service*.
columns.name: ConsumedUnit

columns.description: A set of properties that associate a charge with one or more [*contract commitments*](#glossary:contract-commitment).
columns.name: ContractApplied

columns.description: Cost calculated by multiplying *contracted unit price* and the corresponding Pricing Quantity.
columns.name: ContractedCost

columns.description: The agreed-upon unit price for a single Pricing Unit of the associated SKU, inclusive of negotiated discounts, if present, while excluding negotiated commitment discounts or any other discounts.
columns.name: ContractedUnitPrice

columns.description: The *amortized* cost of the *charge* after applying all reduced rates, discounts, and the applicable portion of relevant, prepaid purchases (one-time or recurring) that covered this *charge*.
columns.name: EffectiveCost

columns.description: The name of the entity whose *resources* are used by the Service Provider to make their [*resources*](#glossary:resource) or [*services*](#glossary:service) available.
columns.name: HostProviderName

columns.description: The invoice-issuer-assigned identifier for an invoice encapsulating *charges* in the corresponding billing period for a given billing account.
columns.name: InvoiceId

columns.description: The name of the entity responsible for invoicing for the *resources* or *services* consumed.
columns.name: InvoiceIssuerName

columns.description: Cost calculated by multiplying List Unit Price and the corresponding Pricing Quantity.
columns.name: ListCost

columns.description: The suggested service-provider-published unit price for a single Pricing Unit of the associated SKU, exclusive of any discounts.
columns.name: ListUnitPrice

columns.description: Describes the pricing model used for a *charge* at the time of use or purchase.
columns.name: PricingCategory

columns.description: The national or virtual currency denomination that a *resource* or *service* was priced in.
columns.name: PricingCurrency

columns.description: The agreed-upon unit price for a single Pricing Unit of the associated SKU, inclusive of *negotiated discounts*, if present, while excluding negotiated *commitment discounts* or any other discounts, and expressed in Pricing Currency.
columns.name: PricingCurrencyContractedUnitPrice

columns.description: The cost of the *charge* after applying all reduced rates, discounts, and the applicable portion of relevant, prepaid purchases (one-time or recurring) that covered this *charge*, as denominated in Pricing Currency.
columns.name: PricingCurrencyEffectiveCost

columns.description: The suggested service-provider-published unit price for a single Pricing Unit of the associated *SKU*, exclusive of any discounts and expressed in Pricing Currency.
columns.name: PricingCurrencyListUnitPrice

columns.description: The volume of a given *SKU* associated with a *resource* or *service* used or purchased, based on the Pricing Unit.
columns.name: PricingQuantity

columns.description: Service-provider-specified measurement unit for determining unit prices, indicating how the service provider rates measured usage and purchase quantities after applying pricing rules like *block pricing*.
columns.name: PricingUnit

columns.description: The name of the entity that made the *resources* or *services* available for purchase.
columns.name: ProviderName

columns.description: The name of the entity that produced the *resources* or *services* that were purchased.
columns.name: PublisherName

columns.description: Host-provider-assigned identifier for an isolated geographic area where a *resource* is provisioned or a *service* is provided.
columns.name: RegionId

columns.description: The name of an isolated geographic area where a *resource* is provisioned or a *service* is provided.
columns.name: RegionName

columns.description: Identifier assigned to a *resource* by the service provider.
columns.name: ResourceId

columns.description: Display name assigned to a *resource*.
columns.name: ResourceName

columns.description: The kind of *resource* the *charge* applies to.
columns.name: ResourceType

columns.description: The name of the entity that made the *resources* or *services* available for purchase or consumption.
columns.name: ServiceProviderName

columns.description: Highest-level classification of a *service* based on the core function of the *service*.
columns.name: ServiceCategory

columns.description: An offering that can be purchased from a service provider (e.g., cloud virtual machine, SaaS database, professional *services* from a systems integrator).
columns.name: ServiceName

columns.description: Secondary classification of the Service Category for a *service* based on its core function.
columns.name: ServiceSubcategory

columns.description: Service-provider-specified unique identifier that represents a specific *SKU* (e.g., a quantifiable good or service offering).
columns.name: SkuId

columns.description: Describes the functionality being metered or measured by a particular SKU in a *charge*.
columns.name: SkuMeter

columns.description: A set of properties of a SKU Price ID which are meaningful and common to all instances of that SKU Price ID.
columns.name: SkuPriceDetails

columns.description: A service-provider-specified unique identifier that represents a specific *SKU Price* associated with a *resource* or *service* used or purchased.
columns.name: SkuPriceId

columns.description: An ID assigned to a grouping of [*resources*](#glossary:resource) or [*services*](#glossary:service), often used to manage access and/or cost.
columns.name: SubAccountId

columns.description: A name assigned to a grouping of [*resources*](#glossary:resource) or [*services*](#glossary:service), often used to manage access and/or cost.
columns.name: SubAccountName

columns.description: A service-provider-assigned name to identify the type of *sub account*.
columns.name: SubAccountType

columns.description: The set of tags assigned to *tag sources* that account for potential provider-defined or user-defined tag evaluations.
columns.name: Tags
